description: Try our easy to follow Roast Pork Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Pork Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Place pork chops and orange slices in a baking dish and cover with foil. Bake for 10 minutes, then remove foil and bake for a further 10-15 minutes or until pork is cooked through. Serve with your choice of salad or vegetables.

Preheat oven to 180°C. Place pork chops and orange slices in a baking dish and cover with foil. Bake for 10 minutes, then remove foil and bake for a further 10-15 minutes or until pork is cooked through. Serve with your choice of salad or vegetables.
